summary.profile: Software Engineer with a proven track record of architecting scalable full-stack systems and high-performance Agentic RAG workflows. Specialized in engineering intelligent infrastructure, such as B2B lead platforms and secure natural language database interfaces, using FastAPI, React, and Gemini Vertex AI. Focused on transforming complex data bottlenecks into production-ready, AI-driven products that deliver measurable cost savings and sub-second performance.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Architected 'Imagini,' a high-performance B2B leads platform housing millions of records, featuring streaming upload pipelines and a credit-based access system. Engineered a multi-agent RAG framework using LangGraph and Gemini to navigate 1.5M Arabic documents with hierarchical workflows. Developed a secure natural language database interface for SWCC and an RFM-based customer segmentation engine for premium airport services.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Fine-tuned DONUT transformer models for OCR-free extraction of French bill data, optimizing for mobile via ONNX conversion. Integrated transformer-based ML models into Next.js applications and built robust data processing pipelines using Python, Pandas, and NumPy, improving use-case accuracy by 25%.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: Implemented real-time object detection solutions using YOLO. Designed intuitive user interfaces using Figma and contributed to mobile application development using Kotlin.

certifications.name: Linear Algebra for Machine Learning and Data Science
Calculus for Machine Learning and Data Science

projects.name: Mandumah Multi-Doc Agent
projects.description: An agentic RAG system designed to navigate 1.5M Arabic academic documents using a hierarchical meta-agent architecture and graph-based traversal. Optimized for complex linguistic nuances with automated summarization tools.

projects.name: High-Scale Email Verification System
projects.description: Multi-layered validation pipeline utilizing DNS resolution, SMTP probing, and heuristics to reduce verification costs by 90%. Supports concurrent processing of hundreds of thousands of emails.

projects.name: ThunderJaw Restaurant POS
projects.description: A robust and scalable e-commerce backend built with Python (Django) and a PostgreSQL database. Implemented user authentication, product management, and a secure payment gateway.

projects.name: B2B Leads Platform (Imagini)
projects.description: Architected a scalable platform managing millions of Saudi-focused leads, featuring streaming data ingestion and a credit-based access system for B2B users. Optimized database indexing and caching to maintain sub-second search and filtering performance across massive datasets.
